name: mikroe.click.nfc6
short_description: NFC 6 Click is a compact add-on board that contains an NFC transceiver for contactless communication. This board features the ST25R95, a near-field communication transceiver from STMicroelectronics. It supports reader and writer operating modes and emulates ISO/IEC 14443-3 Type A cards. The RF communications are done over the 13.56MHz. The transceiver features tag detection mode, field detection mode, transmission and reception modes, and more.
